documents.document: @Oh_Alby what are you waiting for sweetie?
@spandsforever good morning
@louwhite1412 enjoy them
@louwhite1412 I have never seen it this hot.
@louwhite1412 will do, will only go out to see mum, but that's only 5 mins down the road
@louwhite1412 all good thanks, any gym today?
@louwhite1412 how are you feeling today and is your son any better?
@louwhite1412 all cool at the moment, will get rain tomorrow, but on weekend it will be 40 and 45 degrees, will stay indoors both days
@DuranDuranDog @garyjkemp @SteveNormanReal @realmartinkemp @dogcelebration @BDCH @SpandauBallet @RockGod667 Steve might do this

@louwhite1412 aww that's so good 😊
@louwhite1412 make sure he gets lots of ❤❤❤
@louwhite1412 take care of yourself, off to the gym today?
@louwhite1412 yes, got to 42 today, but southerly wind arrived it's now 27. I can breathe again. 😂😂how are you feeling today?
@louwhite1412 good morning gorgeous 😘😘
@CLoredana61 good morning, have a good day
@DavidCampbell73 my son taught his daughter to spell bigboobs on the calculator 😂😂😂
@Di0872 way too hot, think I will stay indoors with ac on
@Di0872 @TotaniJosie would be my pleasure to send some your way 😂😂
@Di0872 you can have some of mine, have plenty to spare 😂😂 both days of weekend will be over 40 with Sunday being 45
@TotaniJosie @Di0872 but look what's coming on the weekend
@TotaniJosie @Di0872 so glad it's cooler
@Di0872 I was earlier, it got to 42 again today, but the southerly has arrived and it's cooling down. Thankfully. ❤… https://t.co/oJ33Y7weR9
@Di0872 good morning, have a great day❤❤

@GalanteDg I too like Spandau Ballet, they're the best
@louwhite1412 its so hot, its just gone 7 am and already its 30 degrees. so tired couldn't sleep well. another 40 degrees today
@AnnaDegli stay warm and have a great day 😊😊
@AnnaDegli at this stage will gladly swap, too hot
@louwhite1412 I'm coming over there to cool down 😂😂😂
@louwhite1412 today was 44, still 42 now, only down to 27 overnight then 42 again tomorrow. WTF all 30 then back to 42 for weekend
@louwhite1412 I cooked last night as well, cause there is no way I'm cooking today in this heat.
@louwhite1412 very good, a rest will help. Have a nice and relaxing day 😘😘
@louwhite1412 I am good thanks, you feeling better today?
@wembleymich thank you 😊
@wembleymich lucky you, stay warm and have a good day 😘
@wembleymich it's horrible. It's 6:30 pm and still 42 degrees. Won't cool down tonight will still be 27 degrees at 6 am tomorrow & backto 42
@Indiepopkid71 good morning
@Yaila73 I'm good thanks, although extremely hot. It's 44 degrees celcius at the moment. How are you?
@TotaniJosie no, same again tomorrow
@TotaniJosie oh no, try and stay cool,
@Yaila73 good morning happy Monday
Omg, I'm melting, it's 44 degrees. So hot I got sunburnt walking the 8 mins to my car after work.

@louwhite1412 yep, it looks like this is going to be our hottest summer ever
@louwhite1412 yes, I did the weekly shop this morning too. Although much easier without kids, can get in and out quickly 😂😂
@TotaniJosie sounds yummy 😋
@louwhite1412 stay warm, we are about to start another week long heat wave. We will have a couple of days above 42. Tomorrow will be 37
@louwhite1412 is it a quieter day today for you?
@louwhite1412 thank you😘😘
@SueWWCoach sure, any time😂😂😂
@SueWWCoach currently 27 here, will be 37 tomorrow and getting hotter each day until Tuesday which will be 42 degrees
@louwhite1412 I'm good thanks. Has been a relaxing day, had my hair done and nearly fell asleep, so relaxing 😃
@SueWWCoach lucky you!, enjoy and have a good day
@louwhite1412 yay, good morning, how are you today? Did you get everything done yesterday?
@SueWWCoach yes, day off for me today as well and work an hour earlier than I would normally, couldn't go back to sleep 😂😂😂
@SueWWCoach I know that feeling
